.
Handling Multiple Issues in Cases Involving Severance of SC
If a decision involves both severance and reduced evaluations, prepare a single rating decision identifying both issues.
Notify the Veteran concerning both the reduction and the proposed severance.
Reference
:  For more information on notifying the Veteran of severance of SC, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 5.C
.
